plugins.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
plugins.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.

accepted.name: Alexandra (Sasha) Hunter
accepted.description: I do graphic and product design.

plugins.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

125014.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
125014.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.
125014.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

plugins.name: Layout Aware Renaming
plugins.description:
Features

- Auto-Detect Grids: Automatically detects rows and columns in your selection.

- Custom Naming: Add prefixes and choose between numeric or alphabetic suffixes.

- Manual Override: Specify exact rows/columns when auto-detection fails.

- Mixed Sizes: Works with elements of different sizes in the same grid.

- Figma & FigJam: Compatible with both Figma and FigJam (limited support).
plugins.tagline: Automatically rename elements based on their grid layout.

116823.name: Layout Aware Renaming
116823.description:
Features

- Auto-Detect Grids: Automatically detects rows and columns in your selection.

- Custom Naming: Add prefixes and choose between numeric or alphabetic suffixes.

- Manual Override: Specify exact rows/columns when auto-detection fails.

- Mixed Sizes: Works with elements of different sizes in the same grid.

- Figma & FigJam: Compatible with both Figma and FigJam (limited support).
116823.tagline: Automatically rename elements based on their grid layout.

plugins.name: Maruco
plugins.description:
What is this?

Maruco is a plugin that provides rules and validation for component naming, helping you identify components that violate naming conventions and elements.


1. Selecting naming convention.

There are several conventions, let's select the best one for your project.


2. Entering naming elements.

Next, you can enter "words" that makes up the component's name.

Enter a comma between words to set multiple words.

Maruco guesses that the component's name is made up of three elements: a prefix, a middle word and a suffix.


3. Running validation.

That's all. Let's run the validation.
plugins.tagline: Effortless rule creation for component naming.

117124.name: Maruco

3. Running validation.

That's all. Let's run the validation.
117124.tagline: Effortless rule creation for component naming.

plugins.name: 数据生成图表可视化工具（专业版） Data Vision Chart Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin enables users to create beautiful and interactive charts directly within Figma. Whether you need a bar, line, donut, or pie chart, the plugin offers real-time updates and customizable styles for seamless data visualization.


Function Description

  1. Create different chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, and Pie charts.
  2. Customize chart styles with predefined themes or use custom colors.
  3. Easily add, edit, and remove data rows with an intuitive interface.
  4. Export generated charts directly as Figma frames for further design use.
  5. Support for multiple languages, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select the chart type you want to create.
  2. Input the required data and choose a predefined color scheme or customize it.
  3. Set the chart dimensions (width and height) as per your design needs.
  4. Click "Generate Chart" to create the chart frame in Figma.
  5. Customize the chart further by adjusting colors and data points as needed.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports dynamic data updates and real-time chart previews.
  2. Ensure that all necessary data rows are filled to avoid incomplete chart generation.
  3. You can switch between chart types to explore different data visualizations.


介绍

此插件让用户可以直接在 Figma 中创建漂亮且交互式的图表。无论是柱状图、折线图、环形图还是饼图，插件都提供实时更新和自定义样式，助力轻松进行数据可视化。


功能说明

  1. 支持生成不同类型的图表：折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。
  2. 提供多种预设主题配色，或使用自定义颜色。
  3. 直观界面，轻松添加、编辑和删除数据行。
  4. 将生成的图表直接导出为 Figma 的框架，用于后续设计。
  5. 支持多种语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要创建的图表类型。
  2. 输入所需数据，选择预设配色或自定义颜色。
  3. 根据设计需要设置图表尺寸（宽度和高度）。
  4. 点击“生成图表”按钮，即可在 Figma 中创建图表框架。
  5. 您可以根据需要进一步调整图表的颜色和数据点。


注意事项

  1. 插件支持动态数据更新和实时图表预览。
  2. 确保所有必要的数据行已填写完整，以避免生成不完整的图表。
  3. 您可以在不同的图表类型之间切换，探索不同的数据可视化效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Generate stunning charts for data visualization with ease

plugins.description:
整理整頓したいアイテム群選択後にこのプラグインを起動すると、同じ名前のフレームや、テキスト、シェイプ、画像などを自動的にグループ化して一覧化してくれます。作業スペースが整理され、過去のアイデアを見つけやすくなりますよ！


----


When you start this plug-in after selecting a group of items you want to organize, frames with the same name, text, shapes, images, etc. will be automatically grouped and listed. Your workspace will be organized and it will be easier to find past ideas!

plugins.name: CSV to Table in Figma
plugins.description:
Transform your data into editable tables directly within Figma with the CSV to Table plugin. This plugin allows you to easily import and visualize your data in a structured format. Perfect for designers who need to incorporate data tables into their wireframes without the hassle of manual entry.


Key Features:


• Easy Import: Upload CSV files to automatically generate tables.

• Customizable Layouts: Define the number of rows and columns, and customize cell dimensions.

• Drag and Drop: Convenient drag-and-drop functionality for file uploads.

• Data Visualization: Instantly convert raw data into a clean, editable table format.

• Integration: Seamlessly works within Figma to enhance your design workflow.


Say goodbye to tedious data entry and hello to efficient data visualization. Enhance your Figma projects with structured tables in just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: Transform Data Files into Editable Tables in Figma

94775.name: CSV to Table in Figma
94775.description:
Transform your data into editable tables directly within Figma with the CSV to Table plugin. This plugin allows you to easily import and visualize your data in a structured format. Perfect for designers who need to incorporate data tables into their wireframes without the hassle of manual entry.

• Customizable Layouts: Define the number of rows and columns, and customize cell dimensions.

• Drag and Drop: Convenient drag-and-drop functionality for file uploads.

• Data Visualization: Instantly convert raw data into a clean, editable table format.

• Integration: Seamlessly works within Figma to enhance your design workflow.


Say goodbye to tedious data entry and hello to efficient data visualization. Enhance your Figma projects with structured tables in just a few clicks!

plugins.name: Liquid Glass Converter
plugins.description:
Simply select any frame or rectangle and click "Create Liquid Glass" to generate both variants.


Transform any frame or rectangle into beautiful glass buttons using Apple's latest WWDC 25 Liquid Glass material specification. This plugin generates two button variants:


  1. Complex Button: Closest to Apple's multi-layer glass effect perfect for hero CTAs and premium interfaces, but not well scalable.
  2. Simple Button: Single-layer glass effect with shadows, background blur, and auto layout text - ideal for secondary actions and scalable designs.



Built with love for the design community ☕
plugins.tagline: Create stunning glass effects like the Apple's WWDC 26 Liquid Glass material design effects

136910.description:

Built with love for the design community ☕
136910.tagline: Create stunning glass effects like the Apple's WWDC 26 Liquid Glass material design effects

plugins.name: Markdown Import
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Google Docsやメモ帳などからコピーしたマークダウン形式のテキストを、Figmaのページ内にインポートするツールです。

「# 見出し1 」「 ## 見出し2」「### 見出し3」「本文」の構造を自動で判別し、それぞれに対応するコンポーネントを選択して挿入することができます。


【主な機能】

  1. マークダウン記法でコピー＆ペースト → 自動でレイアウト生成
  2. 見出し1〜3、本文、それぞれに同一ページ内の任意のコンポーネントを割り当て可能
  3. コンポーネント内のテキストレイヤーを自動で認識し、文字を置換


---


This plugin lets you import markdown-style text into your Figma page directly from Google Docs, Notepad, or any markdown editor.


It automatically parses the structure of your content—such as # Heading 1, ## Heading 2, ### Heading 3, and body text —and allows you to assign custom components for each section during import.


【Key Features】

  1. Paste markdown-formatted text and auto-generate layout in Figma
  2. Assign your preferred components for headings (H1–H3) and body text
  3. Detect and replace text inside the designated layer of each component
plugins.tagline: マークダウンのテキストをコンポーネントを適用してインポート | Import markdown into Figma with component mapping.

plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

accepted.name: OZAR STUDIO
accepted.description: We are a design studio working worldwide . We provide a range of services and  offer a series of products for businesses you can access from our website.

plugins.tagline: Export and Import your variables in a developer-friendy way

plugins.name: Timestamp
plugins.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). It’s perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
plugins.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

135132.name: Timestamp
135132.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). It’s perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
135132.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

plugins.name: Code Craft
plugins.description: Convert your Figma designs into AI-friendly JSON to enhance prompt quality and accelerate code generation. With built-in image detection and download, your visuals are captured seamlessly. Output files are structured and optimized—ready to send to AI agents for fast, accurate implementation. Transform your design into clean, usable code in minutes — no manual handoff, no guesswork.

accepted.name: Artem Svitelskyi
accepted.description: I’m a UX Designer with 10+ years of creating seamless user experiences. My engineering roots sharpen my precision and creativity in turning ideas into results.

plugins.tagline: From Figma to code — smart, fast, and AI-ready.

135384.name: Code Craft
135384.description: Convert your Figma designs into AI-friendly JSON to enhance prompt quality and accelerate code generation. With built-in image detection and download, your visuals are captured seamlessly. Output files are structured and optimized—ready to send to AI agents for fast, accurate implementation. Transform your design into clean, usable code in minutes — no manual handoff, no guesswork.
135384.release_notes: Improved analysis and image detection now allow exports to match Figma-marked images exactly, using the same export settings.
135384.tagline: From Figma to code — smart, fast, and AI-ready.

plugins.name: Panto: Rename Variables in a Snap!
plugins.description: Tired of manually renaming variable prefixes one by one? Panto is here to streamline your workflow! This powerful yet simple plugin allows you to batch rename the initial segment of your Figma variable names.
plugins.tagline: Batch Rename Variables, Simplified

134630.name: Panto: Rename Variables in a Snap!
134630.description: Tired of manually renaming variable prefixes one by one? Panto is here to streamline your workflow! This powerful yet simple plugin allows you to batch rename the initial segment of your Figma variable names.

plugins.name: Design System Explorer
plugins.description: Analyze and manage external design system components, styles, and variables in your Figma file. Quickly identify which elements come from external libraries, see usage counts, and select all instances with one click.
plugins.tagline: design system, library, components, styles, variables, external, inspector, migration, organization

134932.name: Design System Explorer
134932.description: Analyze and manage external design system components, styles, and variables in your Figma file. Quickly identify which elements come from external libraries, see usage counts, and select all instances with one click.
134932.tagline: design system, library, components, styles, variables, external, inspector, migration, organization

plugins.name: Section Distributor
plugins.description:
Section Distributor is a Figma plugin that instantly organizes your Section elements into a clean, vertical stack. Simply select your sections, enter a custom spacing value, and click “Distribute” to move the first section to 0×0 and cascade all others below it at precisely that interval.


Eliminate manual nudging and pixel-perfect alignment headaches—keep your wireframes, design systems, documentation pages, and style guides consistently laid out in seconds.
plugins.tagline: Auto-stack your sections starting at 0,0 with perfect, customizable spacing—one click and done.

134431.name: Section Distributor
134431.description:
Section Distributor is a Figma plugin that instantly organizes your Section elements into a clean, vertical stack. Simply select your sections, enter a custom spacing value, and click “Distribute” to move the first section to 0×0 and cascade all others below it at precisely that interval.


Eliminate manual nudging and pixel-perfect alignment headaches—keep your wireframes, design systems, documentation pages, and style guides consistently laid out in seconds.
134431.tagline: Auto-stack your sections starting at 0,0 with perfect, customizable spacing—one click and done.

plugins.name: Padding Scaler
plugins.description:
Padding Scaler helps designers rapidly create compact, default, and spacious layout variants by scaling the vertical paddings of auto-layout frames.


Instead of editing each value manually, simply select your frames, choose a scale (0.5× to 4×), and instantly apply consistent spacing changes.


Ideal for testing different density modes or aligning with design system spacing tokens.


✨ Features:


Works with one or many auto-layout frames


Choose vertical, horizontal, or both directions


Fast, intuitive UI with live scaling preview


Save time, stay consistent, and iterate layout decisions faster.
plugins.tagline: Instantly scale vertical and/or horizontal paddings in auto-layout frames to test density modes.

134488.name: Padding Scaler
134488.description:
Padding Scaler helps designers rapidly create compact, default, and spacious layout variants by scaling the vertical paddings of auto-layout frames.


Instead of editing each value manually, simply select your frames, choose a scale (0.5× to 4×), and instantly apply consistent spacing changes.


Ideal for testing different density modes or aligning with design system spacing tokens.


✨ Features:


Works with one or many auto-layout frames


Choose vertical, horizontal, or both directions


Fast, intuitive UI with live scaling preview


Save time, stay consistent, and iterate layout decisions faster.
134488.tagline: Instantly scale vertical and/or horizontal paddings in auto-layout frames to test density modes.

plugins.name: Figma Link Exporter
plugins.description:
igmaファイル内のセクション（Section）、コンポーネント（Component）、コンポーネントセット（ComponentSet）、バリアント（Variant）を自動検出し、それぞれの直接リンクを生成するプラグインです。デザインシステムの管理や共有に最適です。

主な機能

  1. 自動検出: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、コンポーネントセット、バリアントを自動で検出
  2. 詳細情報表示: 各要素の番号、種類、名前、直接リンクを一覧表示
  3. 複数形式でエクスポート: 検出した情報をTXT、CSV、JSON形式でダウンロード可能

使用シーン

  1. デザインシステムのドキュメント作成
  2. チーム内でのコンポーネント共有
  3. 開発者へのデザイン仕様の引き渡し
  4. プロジェクト管理のための要素整理

使い方

  1. プラグインを起動
  2. 「情報を取得」ボタンをクリック
  3. 検出された要素の一覧を確認
  4. 希望の形式（TXT/CSV/JSON）を選択してダウンロード
  5. シンプルな操作で、デザインファイル内の重要な要素へのリンクを素早くエクスポートできます。
plugins.tagline: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、バリアントを自動検出し、それらの直接リンクをTXT/CSV/JSON形式でエクスポートできるプラグインです。

plugins.name: Radical: Gradient Background Generator
plugins.description: Generate beautiful gradient backgrounds. Gradients are vector-based, scalable to any resolution. Control colors, background, blur amount, etc. The last Gradient Generator you'll ever need!
plugins.tagline: Generate beautiful gradient backgrounds with customizable colors & blend modes.

134179.name: Radical: Gradient Background Generator
134179.description: Generate beautiful gradient backgrounds. Gradients are vector-based, scalable to any resolution. Control colors, background, blur amount, etc. The last Gradient Generator you'll ever need!
134179.release_notes: Now, frames will generate at 1920x1080 regardless of zoom level; when user is zoomed way out, the blur amount wasn't sufficient. Now when a frame is generated it will always be at the set blur level - then the user can scale to any size they prefer.
134179.tagline: Generate beautiful gradient backgrounds with customizable colors & blend modes.

plugins.name: Figue
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma workflow with Figue, the AI assistant that understands design.


Analyze frames, generate text variations, create images, and receive expert UI/UX advice through natural conversations.


Whether you need fresh content ideas, design feedback, or visual assets, Figue brings the power of GPT-4o directly into your design process.


Save time, spark creativity, and solve design challenges with an AI partner that speaks your language.
plugins.tagline: Your AI design partner inside Figma, transforming UI/UX workflows through smart conversations.

133084.name: Figue
133084.description:
Transform your Figma workflow with Figue, the AI assistant that understands design.


Analyze frames, generate text variations, create images, and receive expert UI/UX advice through natural conversations.


Whether you need fresh content ideas, design feedback, or visual assets, Figue brings the power of GPT-4o directly into your design process.


Save time, spark creativity, and solve design challenges with an AI partner that speaks your language.
133084.release_notes: Improvement in language management and small fixes
133084.tagline: Your AI design partner inside Figma, transforming UI/UX workflows through smart conversations.

plugins.name: Hotkey
plugins.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
plugins.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

135952.name: Hotkey
135952.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
135952.release_notes:
Commands:
1. New Increase/Decrease Width & Height Commands: Use +h, -h, +w, and -w to dynamically adjust height and width values relative to current dimensions.

Other Changes:
1. Added support for + and - prefixes in command parsing (e.g., +h12, -w8) and updated internal regex handling accordingly.
135952.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

plugins.name: LayAuto Plugin
plugins.description:
LayAuto is a responsive SVG layout generator that creates customizable grid-based designs with text and images, perfect for quick visual mockups and design assets.


This Figma plugin imports LayAuto designs by converting the SVG code into accurately positioned Figma elements, while preserving multiline text, shapes, and styling.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly bring LayAuto designs into Figma.

131585.name: LayAuto Plugin
131585.description:
LayAuto is a responsive SVG layout generator that creates customizable grid-based designs with text and images, perfect for quick visual mockups and design assets.


This Figma plugin imports LayAuto designs by converting the SVG code into accurately positioned Figma elements, while preserving multiline text, shapes, and styling.
131585.tagline: Seamlessly bring LayAuto designs into Figma.

plugins.name: Designsystemet - Code syntax
plugins.description:
Dette er en tredjeparts plugin som kan generere CSS-syntax fra designsystemet. Den vil gå gjennom alle variablene som er tilgjengelig for designere i Figma og lage CSS-syntax som matcher den som designsystemet genererer.


På sikt ønsker vi at dette skal bli innebygd i den offisielle Designsystem pluginen. Men frem til den tiden så tilbyr vi denne som en workaround.


NB: Denne vil kun fungere med Designsystemets oppsett av Variabler


Github
plugins.tagline: Legg inn designsystemets CSS syntax med et klikk

132918.name: Designsystemet - Code syntax
132918.description:
Dette er en tredjeparts plugin som kan generere CSS-syntax fra designsystemet. Den vil gå gjennom alle variablene som er tilgjengelig for designere i Figma og lage CSS-syntax som matcher den som designsystemet genererer.


På sikt ønsker vi at dette skal bli innebygd i den offisielle Designsystem pluginen. Men frem til den tiden så tilbyr vi denne som en workaround.


NB: Denne vil kun fungere med Designsystemets oppsett av Variabler


Github
132918.tagline: Legg inn designsystemets CSS syntax med et klikk

plugins.name: Agiliza copy HTML v2.0
plugins.description:
Transforme textos do Figma em blocos HTML com tags como <b>, <i> e <gradiente> automaticamente aplicadas de acordo com os estilos da camada.

Ideal para uso com Elementor, Webflow ou páginas de alta performance.

Também permite exportar diretamente a seleção como imagem WebP (otimizada) ou SVG vetorial.


Funciona 100% dentro do Figma, sem dependências externas.
plugins.tagline: Converta textos em HTML com tags visuais e exporte como WebP ou SVG

666% more evil. 0% outlined text.


🔥 Export SVGs with Figma variables

💀 Keep your text unflattened, unholy

🩸 Sacrifice ids, groups, and other sins

Summon. Optimize. Burn.

Your SVGs shall rise... from hell.

plugins.name: StyleSync
plugins.description: StyleSync extracts text and color styles as well as color variables in your Figma file, lets you select what you need, then generates a JSON that you paste into the companion Framer Plugin that instantly recreates the styles in Framer.
plugins.tagline: Export text and color styles and color variables from Figma and import into Framer.

plugins.name: QuickCheck
plugins.description: QuickCheck is a plugin that helps you promptly run a validation on your layout to check how aligned it is with some of the most known foundational guidelines - such as using multiples of 8 and an 8pt grid, and making sure to be consistent on your color choices. Also, QuickCheck make the correction easier, with a two-click process.
plugins.tagline: Layout verification. Consistency check. Select, check, fix.

Also, QuickCheck make the correction easier, with a two-click process.

plugins.name: figma-text-css
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you extract CSS styles from a selected text layer in Figma.

Get accurate font-weight, font-size, color, line-height, and letter-spacing instantly, formatted in pure CSS.


Perfect for developers and designers who want a fast way to turn styled text into usable web code.


💡 Features:

- Auto-generate CSS for font properties

- RGB to HEX color conversion

- Automatically cleans text by removing line breaks

- Works on selection change for a smooth workflow
plugins.tagline: Instantly copy font styles as CSS

129749.name: figma-text-css
129749.description:
This plugin lets you extract CSS styles from a selected text layer in Figma.

Get accurate font-weight, font-size, color, line-height, and letter-spacing instantly, formatted in pure CSS.


Perfect for developers and designers who want a fast way to turn styled text into usable web code.


💡 Features:

- Auto-generate CSS for font properties

- RGB to HEX color conversion

- Automatically cleans text by removing line breaks

- Works on selection change for a smooth workflow
129749.release_notes: font-family is intentionally omitted from the CSS output. You can manually add it if needed.
129749.tagline: Instantly copy font styles as CSS

plugins.name: Replacer
plugins.description:
You select the object / component in figma and run this plugin.

For color groups: It automatically scans for "groups" and will do it's best to replace it with color variables that share the same naming structure.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

☑ Works with gradient stops, colors in text fields and drop/inner shadows.
plugins.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

127834.name: Replacer
127834.description:
You select the object / component in figma and run this plugin.

For color groups: It automatically scans for "groups" and will do it's best to replace it with color variables that share the same naming structure.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

☑ Works with gradient stops, colors in text fields and drop/inner shadows.
127834.release_notes: Added a "Delete" button to remove selected styles
127834.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

plugins.name: Round Width to 8
plugins.description:
Make your designs cleaner and more consistent with this simple plugin that rounds the width of selected elements up to the next multiple of 8. Great for enforcing 8px spacing systems, aligning to design tokens, or preparing components for dev handoff.


Just select one or more resizable elements and run the plugin — no UI, no fuss.
plugins.tagline: Rounds element widths up to the next multiple of 8 — clean, consistent, and dev-ready.

127315.name: Round Width to 8
127315.description:
Make your designs cleaner and more consistent with this simple plugin that rounds the width of selected elements up to the next multiple of 8. Great for enforcing 8px spacing systems, aligning to design tokens, or preparing components for dev handoff.


Just select one or more resizable elements and run the plugin — no UI, no fuss.
127315.tagline: Rounds element widths up to the next multiple of 8 — clean, consistent, and dev-ready.

plugins.name: frameToGroup
plugins.description:
frameToGroup converts frames into organised groups while retaining essential visual properties.


✨ Key Features

✅ Effortless Conversion – Convert frames into neatly structured groups while keeping fills, strokes, and effects intact.

✅ Nested Frame Handling – Automatically processes nested frames for a well-organised layer structure.

✅ Style Preservation – Retains local styles and effects using asynchronous processing.

✅ User-Friendly UI – Simple, intuitive interface with one-click conversion.

✅ Continuous Workflow – Keep the plugin open for multiple conversions without interruptions.


✨ How to Use

  1. Select the frames you wish to convert in your Figma document.
  2. Click "Convert Frames to Groups" in the plugin UI.
plugins.tagline: Convert Frames to Groups While Retaining Styles

119879.name: frameToGroup
119879.description:
frameToGroup converts frames into organised groups while retaining essential visual properties.


✨ Key Features

✅ Effortless Conversion – Convert frames into neatly structured groups while keeping fills, strokes, and effects intact.

✅ Nested Frame Handling – Automatically processes nested frames for a well-organised layer structure.

✅ Style Preservation – Retains local styles and effects using asynchronous processing.

✅ User-Friendly UI – Simple, intuitive interface with one-click conversion.

✅ Continuous Workflow – Keep the plugin open for multiple conversions without interruptions.


✨ How to Use

  1. Select the frames you wish to convert in your Figma document.
  2. Click "Convert Frames to Groups" in the plugin UI.
119879.tagline: Convert Frames to Groups While Retaining Styles

The plugin is perfect if, for example, you need to design an overview of machines and you want these machines to have random but funny (pet) names.
